To start esquisse, it is best to issue `esquisse::esquisser(viewer="browser")`

If not, the RStudio launches a viewer that is small and less versatile and reliable.

If you use the Addins dropdown, it starts in this viewer as opposed to the browser, hence the preference for the above.
